2. Pete Cain

Pete Cain
=========

![Mayor Pete Cain](https://www.annatexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=8810)



Mayor
-----

* Elected: May 2024
* End of Term: May 2027

[Contact Me](mailto:pcain@annatexas.gov)

About Mayor Pete Cain
---------------------

Mayor Cain was born in Abilene TX. He served in the Marine Corps during Desert Storm and met his wife Denise while serving in California. They have 3 grown children, all of whom are Anna ISD graduates.

He served as a Trustee on the Anna ISD board for multiple terms served on the Greater Anna Chamber of Commerce for many years as board member and Chair. He was recently ordained an Elder at Pin Oaks Christian Fellowship and served up until now on the D&I commission for the City of Anna.




![Anna, TX Homepage](https://www.annatexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=6403)
